thread.title: Title Alliance Announces Appointment of Settlement Specialist
thread.title_full: Title Alliance Announces Appointment of Settlement Specialist

author: Lindsay Smith
title: Title Alliance Announces Appointment of Settlement Specialist
text:
Title Alliance Ltd, an ESOP company specializing in title joint ventures, announced today that they have appointed Erica L. Werner as Settlement Specialist. This role will work with the joint ventured offices providing service and assistance to them, allowing them to continue to expand and grow their offices. Werner is a long time member of the Title Alliance family. Her career began in their Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania operation in 1993 where she ordered searches, typed and reviewed commitments and handled file disbursements. In 2003, she moved to the office in Downingtown, Pennsylvania where she learned how to conduct settlements and prepare settlement sheets. In 2004, Werner was appointed Manager of First Land Transfer, where she successfully grew the office from a brand new, start-up joint venture to an office that conducted 688 closings in 2014.
In her new role as Settlement Specialist, Werner will combine all of her skills to help with continued growth of the Title Alliance family. She’ll provide valuable services such as office coverage, closing coverage, and general office assistance with structuring files and procedures. Her unique perspective, being able to look at an office from the outside, having knowledge of the inner workings of an office, will be really beneficial to help offices become more scalable.
“Erica is extremely professional; detail oriented; organized and takes compliance very seriously, and in today’s market with the regulatory climate, it’s going to be incredibly helpful to have another set of eyes in the field helping us to stay in compliance.” says Jadah Hill, Regional Director for Title Alliance. “This new role will take all of her years of experience and her unique skillset and allow her to use them to help take many of our offices to the next level.”
“Each day will be a new adventure for me,” says Werner. “It will be refreshing to experience different offices and to help them in their quests to grow. I’m very much looking forward to this new challenge.” When asked about leaving First Land, Werner says, “I’m so grateful for my time at First Land Transfer. I learned many things and took the office further than we could have dreamed when we opened the doors. I’m really looking forward to having more time to spend with my family, and this new role will allow me to do just that.”
Title Alliance, Ltd, an ESOP Company is located in Media, PA and has been creating RESPA compliant title joint ventures since 1983 with lenders, mortgage bankers, realtors, builders and credit unions. Their roots date back to 1948 when their first agency, which is still in existence today, was formed. For more information or to find out how a Title Alliance's partnership or title management skills could benefit you visit them online or contact Lindsay Smith at 800-220-3901 x 165.
